一艘: (いっそう) - one ship or boat
一色: (ひといろ) - one color/one colour/one article/monochrome; same tendency/everyone being caught up in the same thing
一色二順: (いっしょくリャンじゅん) - {mahj}  pure double chow; winning hand containing two identical chows (i.e. same numbers and same suit)
一色同順: (いっしょくどうじゅん) - {mahj}  pure double chow; winning hand containing two identical chows (i.e. same numbers and same suit)
一芸: (いちげい) - an art; one talent
一芸に秀でる: (いちげいにひいでる) - to excel in one thing; to be a master in an art
一芸一能: (いちげいいちのう) - (yoji) (excelling in) one area or skill; (being skilled or gifted in) one certain area
一芸入試: (いちげいにゅうし) - (yoji) entrance exam for a university giving preference to persons who excel in one special field (skill); one-talent oriented entrance examination
一苦労: (ひとくろう) - a hard time; pains
一荒れ: (ひとあれ) - squall; burst of anger
一荘: (イーチャン) - {mahj}  one full game (consisting of east, south, west, and north rounds) (chi: yizhuang)
一葉: (ひとは) - one leaf; (いちよう only) one page/one sheet/one card/one photo; one boat
一葉楓: (ヒトツバカエデ) - lime-leaved maple (Acer distylum)
一蓮托生: (いちれんたくしょう) - (yoji) sharing one's lot with another
一虚一実: (いっきょいちじつ) - (yoji) constantly changing phase and being highly unpredictable
一行: (いっこう) - line; row; troupe; party
一行物: (いちぎょうもの) - scroll containing a single line of calligraphy, often of Zen content (usu. found in a tea-ceremony room or house)
一行知識: (いちぎょうちしき) - (yoji) one-line fact; one-line information; information (explanation) provided in a few scanty words
一衣帯水: (いちいたいすい) - (yoji) (being separated only by a) narrow strip of water; narrow strait (channel, river)
一袋: (ひとふくろ) - a bag; one bag
一要素: (いちようそ) - one element; one factor

一見に値する: (いっけんにあたいする) - to be worth seeing

一見客: (いちげんきゃく) - customer one has never met before; first-time customer

一視同仁: (いっしどうじん) - (yoji) loving every human being with impartiality; universal brotherhood; universal benevolence

一角の人間: (ひとかどのにんげん) - somebody (important); someone

一触即発: (いっしょくそくはつ) - (yoji) critical (touch and go) situation; explosive situation
一言: (いちごん) - single word; a few words; brief comment
一言に尽きる: (ひとことにつきる) - (often Ｘの一言に尽きる) to sum it up in one word; ... is the word for it
一言も言わず: (ひとこともいわず) - without saying a word
一言一句: (いちごんいっく) - (yoji) every single word and phrase; word by word
一言一行: (いちげんいっこう) - (yoji) every word and act; just a word or an act
一言二言: (ひとことふたこと) - a word or two
一言二言言う: (ひとことふたこという) - to say a few words
一言半句: (いちごんはんく) - (yoji) a single word; (not even) a word; (not even) a syllable
一言居士: (いちごんこじ) - (yoji) person who is ready to comment on every subject; ready critic
一言隻句: (いちごんせっく) - (yoji) every single word and phrase; each and every word
一計を案じる: (いっけいをあんじる) - to devise a plan; to work out a plan
一話完結型: (いちわかんけつがた) - self-contained (of a story)
一語一句: (いちごいっく) - (yoji) every single word and phrase; each and every word
一語一語: (いちごいちご) - (yoji) word for word; one word
一説: (いっせつ) - one theory (opinion); another theory (opinion)
一読の価値がある: (いちどくのかちがある) - to be worth reading
一読の価値が有る: (いちどくのかちがある) - to be worth reading
一読三嘆: (いちどくさんたん) - (yoji) a reading leaves one with ceaseless sighs of admiration
一読三歎: (いちどくさんたん) - (yoji) a reading leaves one with ceaseless sighs of admiration
一読呆然: (いちどくぼうぜん) - (yoji) a (single) reading (a perusal) leaves one dumbfounded
